All lifecycle events are being displayed in the Log. Take a look at your Logcat and see the logs through the TAG \'LifecycleActivity\'.

This is an example f how to implement Floating Edit Texts on Android. Note this example do not use Support Design Library, that is strongly recommended to use it instead the presented approach.

This is a simple example of Retrofit. Retrofit is a REST Client for Android and Java by Square. This library is easy learn and has more features. This is beginner friendly compared to other Networking libraries.
